evidence.text: Person A: I'm sure you've never heard of it... in fact, it's not even a town... I'm not really sure you could even call it a village... A farm perhaps? .

Person B: MY dream!
Person A: ...as a child I used to put on shows for my family...

Person A: I'll fucking show you Jurassic fitness.
Person A: "Some sort of connection?!"
Person A: Without ME YOU DON'T EVEN EXIST!!!

Person B: The delicate silk material on that horribly old and disgusting leg...
Person B: She's GROSS...
Person B: Fat...
Person B: Old...
Person B: Disgusting.
